name: aeroproject
description:
aeroproject [placeholder title] is a prototype for a  fitness adventure minigame.

using the thematic of a "fitness world", aeroproject tries to frame exercices as a fun hobby instead of focusing efforts in improving one's own  shape. 

ragdoll your way through the exercises and hope for the best!

[SPACE] dialogue

[Z or X + arrow keys]  move arms

prototype by mavw

music by blankluke
